6What is a 2D Layout service? 6What is a 2D plan service? 6A 2D Layout is the two dimensional layout of a house as seen from above. A 2D is used by home building experts to design and construct the house. A 2D request via the Utec App entails requesting for a professional 2D to be made as per your home building requirement. 6A 2D plan is a two dimensional layout of a house as seen from above. It is used by homebuilding experts to design and construct the house. A 2D plan request via the Utec App allows you to request for a professional 2D plan to be made as per your specific homebuilding requirements. 6How do I avail a 2D Layout service? 6How do I avail a 2D plan service? 6You can raise a 2D service request by visiting the Plans section on the Home Page. Select the "Get a layout " option, fill up the basic details about your plot and submit to raise the service request. 6To raise a request for a 2D plan go to the 2D Plans section on the homepage and click on "Request a 2D Plan". Then, fill up the basic details 6What is the process after raising the 2D Service request? 6What happens after I raise a 2D plan service request? 6After the Service request is raised on Utec, our Executive will call you to confirm the request and setup an appointment for collection of additional data. The Utec expert will call you as per the appointment scheduled by you, to collect relevant data to commence the designing process. 6After you raise the service request on the Utec App, our executive will call you to confirm the request and set up an appointment for any extra details that our design team might need. Once we have all the details, we will begin the 2D design. 6What will be delivered as part of 2D Service? 6What will be delivered as part of the 2D plan service? 6You will be receive 1 layout of 2D along with furniture layouts of all floors. 6You will receive one 2D layout of your home, including the furniture layout on all the floors. 6Will it be possible to make changes in the 2D? 6For 2Ds delivered by Utec, you can avail upto 3 reworks. In order to make changes to your selected plan, please call our Customer Care on 1800 266 8823 . They will assist you to book an appointment with the Utec Experts to collect the data for changes. 6For all Utec 2D plans, you can avail up to 3 requests for change. To request a change, you will need to call our Customer Care on 1800 266 8823. They will help you to book an appointment with an Utec expert who will connect with you to collect the details for the change you need. 6What is the cost of availing a 2D Service? 6What is the cost of availing a 2D plan service? 6Currently you can avail the 2D service free of cost. 6This service is free of cost.
6What is a 3D Elevation service? 6What is a 3D plan service? 6A 3D Elevation service on Utec helps you to request for the three dimensional elevation views of your home. All you need to do to raise the service request, is provide us your details and upload the 2D of your home. 6The 3D plan service on the Utec App helps you to request for the three dimensional layout views of your new home. All you need to do to raise the service request, provide us with your details and upload the 2D plan of your home. 6How do I avail a 3D Elevation Service? 6How do I avail a 3D plan service? 6You can raise a 3D Elevation service request by visiting the Plans section on the Home Page. Select the "Get a 3D Plan" option, fill up the mandatory details about your plot, upload the 2D of your home and submit to raise the service request. 6To raise a request for a 3D plan go to the 3D Plans section on the homepage and click on "Request a 3D Plan". Then, fill up the basic details about your plot, upload the 2D layout of your home as asked and submit. Once we receive your request, we will get in touch with you to process it. 6What is the process after raising the 3D Elevation service request? 6What happens after I raise a 3D plan service request? 6After the Service request is raised on Utec, our Executive will call you to confirm the request and setup an appointment for collection of additional data. The Utec expert will call you as per the appointment scheduled by you, to collect relevant data and commence the designing process. 6After you raise the service request on the Utec App, our executive will call you to confirm the request and set up an appointment for any extra details that our design team might need. Once we have all the details, we will begin the 3D design. 6What will be delivered as part of 3D Elevation service? 6What will be delivered as part of 3D Elevation service? 6You will receive two (2) Elevation views along with rendered views of all four sides of your home. 6You will receive 2 3D views of your new home based on your 2D plan along with rendered views of all the four sides of the structure. 6Will it be possible to make changes in the 3D Elevation? 6Can I make changes in the 3D plan? 6For 3D Elevations delivered by Utec, you can avail upto 2 reworks. In order to make changes to your selected elevation, please call our Customer Care on 1800 266 8823 . They will assist you to book an appointment with the Utec Experts to collect the data for changes. 6For all Utec 3D plans, you can avail up to 2 requests for change. To request a change, you will need to call our Customer Care on 1800 266 8823. They will help you to book an appointment with an Utec expert who will connect with you to collect the details for the change you need. 6What is the cost of availing a 3D Service? 6What is the cost of availing a 3D Service? 6The cost of Utec 3D Elevation Service depends on the plot context like size of plot, number of floors, etc. After filling in the necessary data, the service cost will be calculated. 6The cost of an Utec 3D plan depends on project details including size of plot, number of floors, etc. After filling in the necessary details, the service cost will be calculated. 6What is a rough sketch and why is it required? 6What is a rough sketch and why is it required? 6A Rough Sketch is a home design idea drawn roughly with some indicators of size/area/dimensions. It helps us understand your requirement / plot context better before we start designing. To share the rough sketch, you can take a picture of the sketch which has all lines and specifications visible clearly and upload It on Utec app. 6A rough sketch is a home design idea drawn roughly with some indicators of size/area/dimensions. It helps us understand your requirements a bit better before we start designing. To share the rough sketch, you can take a picture of the sketch which has all lines and specifications visible clearly and upload it on the Utec App. 6In which all formats can I upload my Rough Sketch? 6What formats can I use to upload my rough sketch? 6You can upload any type of images (PNG, JPEG, GPG, etc.) also you can upload documents like PDF, etc.If you need any help in uploading files or file related issues, please call our Customer Care Team on 1800 266 8823. 6Rough sketches can be uploaded in formats including PNG, JPEG and GPG. You can also upload PDF documents. If you need any help in uploading files or file-related issues, please call our Customer Care at 1800 266 8823. 6What if I do not have a Rough Sketch for 2D? 6It is not mandatory to provide a rough sketch for 2D. However it helps us understand your requirements/plot context better. 6What if I do not know the Plot Area? 6What if I do not know the plot area? 6Please ask an expert to measure your plot area. It can be submitted in square feet, square yards, Gunthas etc. 6Please ask an expert to measure your plot area. It can be submitted in square feet, square yards, Gunthas etc. 6What if I do not have the site pictures right now? 6What if I do not have the site pictures right now? 6You can upload site pictures as and when you receive them. 6You can upload site pictures as and when you receive them. 6What if I do not have the exact address right now? 6What if I do not have the exact address right now? 6In case you do not have the exact site address with you, you can enter your pin code in the map or nearest landmark with your location. 6In case you do not have the exact site address with you, you can enter your pin code in the map or nearest landmark with your location. 6How will I know if my request for 3D elevation is submitted? 6How will I know if my request for 3D plan is submitted? 6You will receive a notification saying 3D Request sent successfully. 6You will receive a notification saying 3D plan request sent successfully. 6Where will I get notifications regarding my request? 6Where will I get notifications regarding my request? 6You will receive notifications on Utec app as well as via SMS/Email/WhatsApp. Click on the bell icon on the Utec Home Page to view the past notifications. 6You will receive notifications on the Utec App as well as via SMS/Email/WhatsApp. Click on the bell icon on the the Utec homepage to view the past notifications.
6What is VR? 6Virtual Reality (VR) is a service that helps you experience the three dimensional view of your house in an interactive manner. Utec offers the VR service on charge basis. All you have to do is raise a service request with your details, such as plot details and 3D. 6What does Select a plan for the VR experience mean? 6You may select one plan out of 3D Elevation views delivered, for the final VR experience. 6What is the cost of availing the VR Service? 6The cost of Utec VR Experience depends on the plot context like size of plot, number of floors, etc. After filling in the necessary data, the service cost will be calculated. 6What does Add to Archivesmean? 6As a part of Layout Plan service, Utec provides more than one house plan. Please go through the plans and finally select the plan you want to proceed with for either 3D or for making changes. The remaining plans not selected by you, can be accessed through Archives. 6How can I access my Archives folder later? 6In order to access your Archives, please go to your service request output from My Projects of Utec app. Click on the Options menu, and then click on Archives to view the archived plans. 6How can I avail a VR Experience if I choose an existing design on the platform? 6Please raise a service request for VR walkthrough in the Plans section on Utec App. Mention the design name that you liked along with the mandatory details. Our Customer Care Team will then update you on the time it will take to build the VR experience for you. 6How can I change my slot of VR Experience? 6Please call our Customer Care Team on our toll free number 1800 266 8823 6Is it possible to make some changes in the house layout after VR Experience? Can I resubmit the Layout /3D elevation? 6Changes in the layout plan post the delivery of a 3D elevation or a VR Experience are not possible. Changes are possible in the 2D and 3D Elevation stage before finalisation of each plan. You may raise a new request for an updated plan along with the required changes. 6How can I schedule a visit for the VR Experience? 6You can schedule a VR walkthrough delivery from the available locations with your preferences for date and the time slot. Our Customer Care Team will call you to confirm the appointment or call our Customer Care on 1800 266 8823 to schedule the appointment yourself. 6What should I be aware of, before requesting for VR walkthrough service? 6You can request for VR Experience only once the 3D elevation is finalised - VR Experience cannot be requested for, without a 3D Elevation. Do call our Customer Care Team on 1800 266 8823 for more details. 6What are the requirements to raise the 3D request? 6What are the requirements to raise a 3D plan request? 6To raise a 3D request, you need to upload a Layout plan, created by an Expert and finalised by you. Along with it, you need to provide your colour preferences, budget preferences, any special requirements or reference pictures that you want to share with our team.
6To raise a 3D request, you need to upload a Layout plan, created by an Expert and finalised by you.
